posts.title: Energy Scavenging From Human Locomotion
posts.description: This project is based on renewable source of energy generation which will dominate in the  future world.

posts.title: SMART GLOVE FOR SIGN LANGUAGE VOCALIZATION
posts.description:
The main purpose of this project is to make a device which can detect the gesture and
the movement, recognize the sign and output it via display as text and via a speaker as
sound.
